item.title: Resources for Getting Started on Data Science
item.description: R R for Data Science - https://r4ds.had.co.nz/ “This book will teach you how to do data science with R: You’ll learn how to get your data into R, get it into the most useful structure, transform it, visualise it and model it. In this book, you will find a practicum of skills for data science.
